anime.description: Dorogoza Island is rich in "Drop Energy" that players can use on friendly monsters. Once strong enough, they can face enemies in puzzle wars.

tag.name: juujin
tag.description: Kemono, "beast", is a genre of Japanese art and character design that prominently features anthropomorphic animal characters. It is used widely in visual arts, especially drawing and painting, and can be found in many manga, anime, and video game. Anthropomorphic animal characters in the kemono genre are frequently called juujin, "therianthrope"; the kanji for juujin are also sometimes pronounced kemonobito, "beast-human". While their design differs from artist to artist, they generally employ animal traits considered cute and endearing; most kemono characters retain a fundamentally human personality, however, seldom behaving as the actual animals from which they have been anthropomorphized, and as such they are typically depicted living as humans do. Juujin leans more on the human-looking side when compared to http://anidb.net/t2857 [anthropomorphism], which leans more on the animal-looking side. Source: Manga Wikia

tag.name: shounen
tag.description: In the context of manga and associated media, shounen, literally meaning "youth" and often also specifically "boy", refers to a male audience roughly between the ages of 10 and 18. Source: Wikipedia

tag.name: magic
tag.description: Magic is the art of purportedly manipulating aspects of reality either by supernatural means or through knowledge of unknown occult laws.

tag.name: dragon
tag.description: Very intelligent mythical beings - a cross between a very large lizard and a dinosaur - that breath fire, and have a knack for kidnapping damsels, thus distressing them. In Fantasy anime this perceptive species often lives secluded from human civilisation, protectors of long lost knowledge. Dragons seem to be on the verge of extinction.

tag.name: dynamic
tag.description: Some of the central structural elements in anime are: Plot Continuity How does the plot or several plots unfold. Are they a strictly linear retelling of one big continuing story, a serial, possibly with several side stories, or is the content chopped into a set of unconnected episodes, only sharing the same setting and characters? Stereotype Characters Then there is the question of the character set presentation. Is it completely original, or is it your usual stereotypical character cast. Both choices have their merit, for example it would not really make much sense to reinvent the wheel for a harem anime. Fans of that genre come to expect their favourite stereotype protagonists. Plot Twists Finally there is the question of how complex the plot / the story unfolds. Are there side-plots that merge into the main plot leading to unexpected plot twists, or is the anime quite predictable? The latter would not be appropriate for detective stories. In harem anime on the other hand a foreseeable outcome is actually something the fans will come to expect.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: setting
tag.description: The setting describes in what time and place an anime takes place. To a certain extent it describes what you can expect from the world in the anime.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: place
tag.description: The places the anime can take place in. Includes more specific places such as a country on Earth, as well as more general places such as a dystopia or a mirror world.

tag.name: fictional location
tag.description: A fictional location is a place or world which is run by different set of rules than our common and ordinary world. This may include completely fictional worlds with no semblance of Earth, computer-generated worlds, fantasy worlds, magical worlds, parallel worlds accessible through portals, and so on. Or it may be fictional places like floating islands, dungeons or planets, which can co-exist with ordinary Earth, but are otherwise separate from it. A world that generally shares the characteristics of, and/or is generally indistinguishable from the real world (bar research on a "more than cursory" level), would NOT be considered a fictional world. A good example is http://anidb.net/a4521 [Code Geass]. It contains several real world nationalities, such as http://anidb.net/a4521 [China], http://anidb.net/t2672 [Japan] (now Area 11), http://anidb.net/t5091 [India], etc, along with fictional nationalities such as http://anidb.net/t2361 [Britannia]. China, Japan, and India are easily identified with a cursory look. The location is unmistakably the planet Earth, even though national borders have been redrawn. The fictional world should only be tagged if it plays a materially important role in the plot and setting; generally, an episodic occurrence of a fictional world should not be tagged. A fantasy world is a type of fictional world, part of a fictional universe. Typical worlds involve, but are not limited to: magic or magical abilities, and/or a medieval theme. Some examples include: a parallel world tenuously connected to Earth via magical portals or items; a fictional Earth-like planet in the remote past or future; or an entirely independent world set in another universe. Many fantasy worlds draw heavily on real world history, geography, and sociology, and also on folklore.

tag.name: plot continuity
tag.description: Consistency of the characteristics of persons, plot, objects, places and events seen by the viewer. A single linear focused plot is highly continuous. A truly random plot is highly discontinuous.

tag.name: action
tag.description: Action anime usually involve a fairly straightforward story of good guys versus bad guys, where most disputes are resolved by using physical force. It often contains a lot of shooting, explosions and fighting.

tag.name: fantasy
tag.description: Fantasy is a genre of fiction that uses magic and other supernatural phenomena as a primary element of plot, theme, or setting. Many works within the genre take place in fictional worlds where magic is common. Fantasy is generally distinguished from science fiction and horror by the expectation that it steers clear of (pseudo-)scientific and macabre themes, respectively, though there is a great deal of overlap between the three (which are subgenres of speculative fiction). In popular culture, the genre of fantasy is dominated by its medievalist form, especially since the worldwide success of The Lord of the Rings books by J. R. R. Tolkien. In its broadest sense however, fantasy comprises works by many writers, artists, filmmakers, and musicians, from ancient myths and legends to many recent works embraced by a wide audience today. Fantasy is a vibrant area of academic study in a number of disciplines (English, cultural studies, comparative literature, history, medieval studies). Work in this area ranges widely, from the structuralist theory of Tzvetan Todorov, which emphasizes the fantastic as a liminal space, to work on the connections (political, historical, literary) between medievalism and popular culture Source: Wiki

tag.name: friendship
tag.description: The feeling of trust, kindness, and friendship between a group of high school students for example, is a central theme of this anime.

tag.name: proxy battles
tag.description: In our terms, a proxy battle is a battle where humans use creatures/robots to do the fighting for them, either by commanding those creatures/robots or by simply evolving them/changing them into battle mode. Often the training aspect is also involved, or in some cases the proxies are nothing more than holographic representatives of some other variation of competition (like for example a card game). While many popular shounen anime fit under this category, it`s not limited to shounen anime.

tag.name: following one`s dream
tag.description: No matter what the hardships may be, at least one of the protagonists in this anime is following her/his dream. Examples: To become a professional athlete, a musician, a painter or the ruler of this world!

tag.name: rivalry
tag.description: Quite broadly used term describing a conflict, contest, struggle, or opposition of some sort. Typical examples: The mostly comedic rivalry for the love of a protagonist in a harem anime (love polygon), the more "mindless" battles between wannabe delinquents in a school fighting anime, or the struggle between good & evil in an epic conflict for world domination.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: ドラゴーザ島
Dragoza Island
Dragouza Tou
episode.summary: Ace, Tamazo, and Charo safely arrives on Dragoza Island. When he visits his grandmother, she gives him a D-Gear; a device used by Dragon Callers. Eager to try it out, Ace goes into the woods to find a monster that would become his ally. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タマゾー奪還大作戦
Operation Tamazo-Rescue
Tamazou Dakkan Daisakusen
episode.summary: Tamazo, the special egg that hatched, gets kidnapped by the SDF. In order to rescue him, Ace and Charo sneaks inside the SDF base. After successfully rescuing Tamazo, Charo convinces Ace to go to Dragoza Island with him to become Dragon Callers together. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クロスオン
Cross-On
Cross On
episode.summary: Lance fights the Chaos Devil Dragon, but has a difficult time due to SDF`s intervention. The special egg speaks to Ace, and Ace is able to create more Drops for Lance, leading to victory. Curious about everything, Ace goes to the Dragon Museum. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドロップ・インパクト
Drop Impact
Drop Impact
episode.summary: Ace, a boy in Vienna City living an average life, finds a mysterious egg calling for his name. Little does he know that the egg is a special "Drop" that both Lance, the Dragon Caller, and the Special Drop Defensive Force are looking for. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キングのあしあと
King`s Footsteps
King no Ashiato
episode.summary: Ace faces his final test in his Guild Dragon Caller`s exam - a one-on-one battle with Morgan, the Dragon Caller of Dark. She has her "stud-monster," Vampire Lord, and isn`t holding back. Can Ace and his team withstand her attacks and win the battle? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギルド龍喚士への道
The Path to Guild Dragon Caller
Guild Ryuukanshi e no Michi
episode.summary: To become a stronger Dragon Caller, Ace goes into training under Herriot`s wing. Just when he completes his training, he learns of the Guild Dragon Caller`s exam. Will he be able to pass the exam and become a Guild Dragon Caller? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: マリンゴの木
Mapple Tree
Maringo no Ki
episode.summary: Ace quickly takes another step forward in becoming a strong Dragon Caller as he welcomes another monster to his team. He builds his confidence from this, but, he may be biting off more than he could chew when he goes off to stop a Drop Impact himself. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ソウルアーマー
Soul Armor
Soul Armor
episode.summary: Obtaining D-Gear and his first monster, Ouka, Ace wants to take the next step - getting his hands on a Soul Armor. Donny tells them that he can find one at the Sacred Temple, but warns that everyone who has set foot there have never returned... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 新しい古老
The New Ancient
Atarashii Korou
episode.summary: As the new Ancient of Wood, Torlie is put to the test to prove he`s worthy, but he still hasn`t overcome his stage-fright. Meanwhile, Ace and his friends go inside the woods in search of Charo`s D-Gear, but something is very wrong there... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 木の街リブリア
Wood City Libria
Ki no Machi Libria
episode.summary: With the Ancient of Wood, Tinbell, taking ill, he decided to step down and named two candidates as the next Ancient; One of whom is the one who saved Charo`s life. However, not being able to handle the pressure very well, his odds doesn`t look so good... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 火の古老エルドラ
Ancient of Fire, Eldora
Hi no Korou Eldora
episode.summary: To figure out why the hot spring has turned into water, Ace and his friends goes to find the monster that acts as a heat source. There, they find Salamander in a weakened state. They find a way to help him, but their plan may have backfired... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ガイザーから来た男
A Man from Geyser
Geyser kara Kita Otoko
episode.summary: Ace and his friends arrive at the Fire City Geyser, when Garnet calls them over to help out at her concert. There, they meet Tiger, a man from Geyser with flaming-hot passion. When the Drop Impact hits during the concert, it`s up to them to save the day. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: チャロとお化けの森
Charo and the Haunted Forest
Charo to Obake no Mori
episode.summary: To find his dream-monster, Toyceratops, Charo and his friends head to Woodstorm, a forest where many rare monsters reside. There, they meet Garnet, who has been tasked to hunt ghosts. Reluctantly, they join Garnet and goes into a haunted mansion... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エンテツの魂[ソウル]
Entetsu`s Soul
Entetsu no Soul
episode.summary: In order to get ready for the Battle Cup, Ace and his friends head to Sand City, Vegahs to hone their skills as Dragon Callers. There, Tiger is conned into a fixed match, but Entetsu, a monster that saved Tiger before, comes to save him again. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 帰ってきたエース
Ace Returns
Kaette Kita Ace
episode.summary: Ace returns to Vienna City to let his mom know that he`s now an official Guild Dragon Caller. Lena`s proud of him, but when another monster goes on a rampage, Lena lets her worry get the best of her and goes to find Ace... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ギルド入団試験
Guild Dragon Caller`s Exam
Guild Nyuudan Shiken
episode.summary: It`s Charo`s first time, Ace`s second time, and Tiger`s, well, eleventh time taking the Guild Dragon Caller`s Exam. But their last test is a battle against Lance. Lance allows all three of them to fight him at once, but can they still manage to beat him? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タイガーはつらいよ
Tiger`s Tough Time
Tiger wa Tsurai yo
episode.summary: Tiger meets his old childhood friend - Rose. They have a friendly competition to see who`ll find the Red Carbuncle first. With a little tough love, Tiger realizes that he hasn`t accomplished anything by himself yet, and makes a tough decision. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ドロップの秘密
The Secret of Drops
Drop no Himitsu
episode.summary: Torlie goes into the forest to investigate the cause of increased Drops in the area, and Ace and his friends tag along. There, they find a monster, Fortoytops, suffering from taking in too much Drops. To save him, Charo steps up to the challenge. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇に輝く誓い
The Promise in the Darkness
Yami ni Kagayaku Chikai
episode.summary: When Lance was just a little boy, the Drop Impact took away everything from him - his house, his mom, his dad. After that, Lance was on his own, until he met Devi. The two became good friends and spent their time together, until one day... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 白き龍
The White Dragon
Shiroki Ryuu
episode.summary: Ace takes on a mission with Lance to deal with a dragon on rampage. However, they soon learn that the dragon has his reasons to be upset - the Egg Drop trafficking organization hunted his friends. Will Ace and Lance be able to save the other dragons? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神に護られし者
The One Protected by Gods
Kami ni Mamorareshi Mono
episode.summary: Ace and the gang goes to the Light City and hears about the almighty Dragon Caller, Sturgeon. Hoping they can get some training from him, they set off to find him with a boy named "Astell." However, they soon find out who the boy really is... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 潜入! SDF秘密基地
Breaking into SDF`s Secret Base
Sennyuu! SDF Himitsu Kichi
episode.summary: Ace and Sonia visit an island where "Death" has been sighted. This monster is a dangerous monster that controls other monsters to harm people. In the island, they also find unbalance in the Drops and SDF`s secret base. Could everything be related? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 我が青春のヴァルキリー
Our Youthful Valkyrie
Waga Seishun no Valkyrie
episode.summary: At a school where they train children with the potential to become Dragon Callers, Garnet is invited as a guest speaker. She remembers what it was like when she was a student there herself, and Valkyrie never made her school-life any easier. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エースからのメール
E-Mail from Ace
Ace kara no Mail
episode.summary: Thinking about dropping his mom a line, Ace reflects on what had happened since he first left his hometown, Vienna City. His first D-Gear, his first friend, his first monster, and when he finally became a Guild Dragon Caller. So much has happened! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 嵐をこえろ
Surviving the Storm
Arashi o Koeru
episode.summary: Ace and Tamazo head to the Duen Desert to find a monster called god. Ace is so fixated on becoming strong that he doesn`t realize he`s forgotten something very important as a Dragon Caller. Will the god find Ace unworthy, or will Ace open his eyes? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光の街の悪夢
Nightmare in Light City
Hikari no Machi no Akumu
episode.summary: Defeated by Sturgeon, Ace seeks more strength. However, he doesn`t know how to achieve that. Grasping at straws, he ignores Tamazo`s warning and listens to a mysterious e-mail he receives. Unfortunately, the e-mail leads them to a Drop Impact site... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 俺たちの友情バトル!
Our Friendship Battle!
Oretachi no Yuujou Battle!
episode.summary: Winning his second round by default, Ace fights Charo next. They both agree to give the battle 100%, but Ace lets their friendship get in the way. Not being able to synchronize with Horus, can Ace overcome this obstacle, or will his battle end here? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ヴァルキリーの目覚め
Valkyrie Awakens
Valkyrie no Mezame
episode.summary: It`s the second round in the Battle Cup, and Garnet`s opponent is Klein. Despite her efforts, Klein seems to be have the upper hand, and things aren`t looking so good for Garnet. In order to live up to her fans` faith, Garnet makes a decision... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ソウルブレイブ発動!
Soul Brave Activated!
Soul Brave Hatsudou!
episode.summary: After going their separate ways, Tiger finally understands what it means to be strong. Ace remembers what Sonia said as well, and puts it together to activate Soul Brave. Succeeding in his bold move, Ace defeats Tiger and moves on to the next match! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: バトルカップ開幕!
Battle Cup Begins!
Battle Cup Kaimaku!
episode.summary: Finally, the annual Battle Cup has started! Ace, along with all the other Dragon Callers, are eager to show off their strengths in the tournament. However, Ace`s opponent for the first match is... Tiger! Does Ace stand a chance against him? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最強の龍喚士
The Strongest of All Dragon Callers
Saikyou no Ryuukanshi
episode.summary: The last remaining finals is class A, Harriot versus Lance. Losing to Lance once, Harriot is determined to win this time. She feels confident that the lifting of the ban on Soul Brave will work to her advantage, but will Lance be able to prove her wrong? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 非道! クロエルの鞭
Appalling! Kroell`s Whip
Hidou! Kroell no Muchi
episode.summary: In class C finals, Ace battles Kroell. With Kroell`s leader skill cutting his Dark-attribute attacks in half, Ace has a hard time dealing damage against Kroell. However, seeing how poorly Kroell treats his monsters, this is a fight Ace cannot lose. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 双子の記憶
Twin`s Memories
Futago no Kioku
episode.summary: It`s Garnet vs. Star John, and while she uses her skills for a massive attack twice in a row, it still wasn`t enough to take him down. Garnet`s defeat seems to have triggered something for Morgan, but even her twin sister, Herriot doesn`t know what. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光と闇の龍喚士
Dragon Caller of Light and Dark
Hikari to Yami no Ryuukanshi
episode.summary: The twin sisters, Herriot and Morgan, fights for the class A semi-finals. They each have 15 wins and 15 losses fighting each other, and are determined to settle this once and for all in this battle, using Soul Brave. Which one will come out victorious? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激突! エースvsランス
Battle! Ace Versus Lance
Gekitotsu! Ace vs Lance
episode.summary: Finally, the fight everyone`s been waiting for. Ace wants to win, not so much as winning the tournament but as defeating Lance. Ace is going to give everything he`s got, but it looks like Lance isn`t going to hold back either. Will Ace be able to win? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エースvsスタージョン
Ace Versus Starjohn
Ace vs Starjohn
episode.summary: With the winners from each class now determined, the Representative Battle begins! First off is class B champion, Starjohn, versus class C champion, Ace. Ace has already lost to Starjohn once; will he be able to win this time? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の決戦
The Final Battle
Saigo no Kessen
episode.summary: Ace`s strong emotion to become stronger in order to defeat Lance has triggered something inside him, but it seems he has lost himself in all that power. In order to keep the playing field level, Lance is forced to step up his game, too. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 激闘! ランスvsエース
Intense Battle! Lance Versus Ace
Gekitou! Lance vs Ace
episode.summary: Ace is able to successfully bring out Horus` power and his strong will to win this battle is pushing him to the extreme. Unfortunately, his Soul Armor reaches its limit before Ace does. However, that still isn`t enough to stop Ace from pushing harder. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 森[リブリア]の誇り
Pride of Libria
Libria no Hokori
episode.summary: Ace and Garnet visits Charo and Torlie to see if they know something about Morgan. Torlie shares his suspicion of foul play during the Drop Impact when Dafnes went missing. Just then, their forest is under attack, with multiple Drop Impacts triggered. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 奪われたエッグドロップ
The Stolen Egg Drop
Ubawareta Egg Drop
episode.summary: Ace and Garnet arrives at the Dark City, Zelemony. There, they find out that someone`s been targeting female Dragon Callers and stealing their Egg Drops. Does this have something to do with Morgan`s disappearance? Ace and Garnet is determined to find out. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あらたなる脅威
New Threat
Aratanaru Kyoui
episode.summary: In search of Morgan, Ace and Garnet reaches the Light City and learn of a "suspicious Dragon Caller" looking for Vampire Lords. Could that be Morgan? Meanwhile, the Ancients hold a meeting to discuss what the take-away should be from the Battle Cup. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: それぞれの旅立ち
Their Separate Ways
Sorezore no Tabidachi
episode.summary: The Battle Cup finally ends, and Tiger, Charo, and other Dragon Callers all go their separate ways, looking forward to the day they meet and battle again. Ace is no exception, and is asked to go on a quest to find Morgan, who has gone missing. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ひびわれた円卓
The Crack in the Round Table
Hibiwareta Entaku
episode.summary: When Angene releases a monster called Myr, the Keeper of Time, Ace is shown the past, when his father, King, and his grandmother, Angene, still lived in the Dragonoid`s Village, Stella. Ace learns how his father`s ability as a Dragon Caller was awoken. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エクシオンを守れ!
Protect Exscion
Exscion o Mamore!
episode.summary: Morgan, a member of the Dominion, destroys the Dragon God Statue, triggering a Drop Impact. Ace and Garnet prevents the catastrophe, but Haru is blamed, just for being human. Ace is shocked to see such discrimination, but can he change the world? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 漆黒の挑戦
Challenge from the Darkness
Shikkoku no Chousen
episode.summary: Starting with Morgan, other Guild Dragon Callers have gone missing as well, seemingly joining the mysterious organization. Lance is also missing, but does that mean he betrayed the Guild as well? Ace goes to find Lance to find out what is going on. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼレモニを襲う影
The Shadow Attacking Zelemony
Zelemony o Osou Kage
episode.summary: Ace and Garnet goes back to Zelemony, but something is very wrong at the city. While looking around, they find Tiger, who`s on a mission to find those responsible for hurting the monsters in the area. Can they restore the city to its original state? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜の墓場
Dragon`s Graveyard
Ryuu no Hakaba
episode.summary: To tell the people in Stella that they`re in danger, Ace and Garnet goes on a mission to find the key to Stella - the legendary dragon. With Sonia`s help, they reach their destination, but apparently, they aren`t the only ones looking for the key... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アンジーヌの祈り
Angene`s Wish
Angene no Inori
episode.summary: When Angene releases a monster called Myr, the Keeper of Time, Ace is shown the past, when his father, King, and his grandmother, Angene, still lived in the Dragonoid`s Village, Stella. Ace learns how his father`s ability as a Dragon Caller was awoken. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 三つの月の下で
Under the Three Moons
Mittsu o Tsuki no Shita de
二つの龍
The Two Dragons
Futatsu no Ryuu
episode.summary: Determined to find Stella, Morgan is finally on the move. She releases the sealed dragon, Dark Apocalypse to force open the path to Stella. However, with the legendary Brave Cross Dragon on his team, Ace will do everything he can to save Stella. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 竜人の里ステラ
The Dragonoid`s Village, Stella
Ryuujin no Sato Stera
episode.summary: Guided by the Three Moon Compass, Ace and Tamazo arrives in a familiar area. Inside the sacred forest, they meet a mysterious girl. After finding Stella, Ace tells them they`re in grave danger, but the Elder doesn`t seem to want any help from humans... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神の砦
God`s Fort
Kami no Toride
episode.summary: On their way to Stella, Ace and the gang arrives at Starjohn`s castle. As the last member of his family, Starjohn continues to serve as the protector of Stella. However, the Dominion also shows up, triggering multiple Drop Impacts. What will they do? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 神の使命
Mission of God
Kami no Shimei
episode.summary: Match one of round two starts off with Tiger fighting a masked opponent, Zyoot. Angry about what Zyoot did to Rose, losing isn`t an option for Tiger. Fighting another masked opponent is Starjohn, who also wants his revenge on what they did to his castle. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 謎の龍喚士たち
Mysterious Dragon Callers
Nazo no Ryuukanshi-tachi
episode.summary: The fierce battle in the Grand Battle Cup continues, with Garnet fighting against Cynthia, her junior friend in the Dragon Caller Academy. Starjohn also fights against Blitz, who seems to have some kind of beef with the Starjohn family. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ステラの秘密
Stella`s Secret
Stella no Himitsu
episode.summary: Although Stella`s Elder, Hofs, disagreed to share the secret of Reversion, Lance hasn`t given up. He tag-teams with Ana to figure out where the secret is hidden. However, with that and his painful memory from the past, Devi`s more than worried for him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: グランド・バトルカップ開幕!
Grand Battle Cup Begins!
Grand Battle Cup Kaimaku!
episode.summary: To prepare for another threat like the Dominion, Jest has formed an elite squad called the Guardians. Hosting the Grand Battle Cup, he hopes to recruit Dragon Callers worthy of joining the squad. However, something fishy is going on in the tournament... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 暴かれた秘密
The Revealed Secret
Abakareta Himitsu
episode.summary: Lance learns that someone in Luna was conducting a research on Star Fragment. Hearing about his hometown, Lance decides to stop by, bringing back painful memories. They find a secret passage, and Lance learns the truth about what happened... Or does he? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ほしのかけら
Star Fragment
Hoshi no Kakera
episode.summary: The second semi-final match is Ace vs Tiger. They`ve both trained hard for this day and aren`t going to hold back! Meanwhile, Lance is still looking for the secret to Reversion in Stella. Something is going on with Devi, but is it related to the secret? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: リブリアの日々
The Days in Libria
Libria no Hibi
episode.summary: Instead of participating in the Grand Battle Cup, Charo stays behind to do some research to figure out Dominion`s true intent. His hard work pays off and Charo makes sense of what might have happened in the Dragon`s Graveyard, but could it be too late? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 闇との激戦
Fierce Battle Against the Darkness
Yami to no Gekisen
episode.summary: Ace`s next match is against Mere, representing the Dark City. For some reason, Mere sees Ace as a rival, but he eventually explains why. Garnet`s also up against Ost, and despite her best efforts, she quickly learns that Ost is on a different level. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 救済者
The Savior
Kyuusaisha
episode.summary: Ace tries to fight Lance, but the power of Reversion is too great. To make things worse, Eldora also decides to Revert, causing the ley line to go haywire, throwing Dragoza Island into chaos. Just when it seemed all hopes were lost, a savior appears... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジェストの野望
Jest`s Ambition
Jest no Yabou
episode.summary: Lance is forced to go into Reversion, losing himself in the power. Just when it seemed Ana got to Lance in time, the Star Fragment completely consumes him. With the other Ancients` hands tied, it`s up to Ace to stop Lance, but will he succeed? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ランス咆哮
Lance`s Roar
Lance Houkou
episode.summary: The Grand Battle Cup ends with Ace as the winner. His friends congratulate him, but Ace is disappointed that he couldn`t fight Lance. His wish is granted but not in the way he had hoped. Lance is losing control, going through some kind of transformation. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 決戦のエース
Ace`s Final Showdown
Kessen no Ace
episode.summary: The finals for the Grand Battle Cup is about to start! Ace is up against Ost, the leader of Dominion with strong power. This is his opportunity to stop Dominion once and for all, but will he succeed? And is Ost really Dafnes, or could it be someone else? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 金色の翼
Golden Wings
Kin`iro no Tsubasa
episode.summary: To find his friends, Ace sets off to Dark City, Zelemony. There, he finds out that they`re all wanted by Dominion. Luckily, he joins up with Garnet, and together they walk around the city trying to find Guild`s secret base they heard about. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 極光太陽神
Pure Light Sun Deity
Kyokukou Taiyoushin
episode.summary: To get his power back as a Dragon Caller, Ace heads to Mount Saul. There, he meets the Pure Light Sun Deity, Ra, and a cute little tamadra. Ace must pass Ra`s trial to reclaim his power back, but he will have to pay with his soul if he fails... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ステラの目覚め
Stella Awakens
Stera no Mezame
episode.summary: Defeated by Lance, Ace was taken to Stella to recover. However, he wakes up only to find out that he has lost his power as a Dragon Caller. Seeing how devasted Ace is, Hofs tells him of an old legend that has been passed down in Stella. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: タマタマ行くならこんな島
Travel Destinations with Tamatama
Tamatama Iku nara Konna Shima
episode.summary: An unfortunate scheduling conflict forces the studio to have Tamazo host a different show today. Instead of our regular Puzzle & Dragons X anime, Tamazo will be hosting "Tama/Devi Best 10!" What`s hot right now in Dragoza? And what about the new monster? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アングリー・タイガー
Angry Tiger
Angry Tiger
episode.summary: Ace and Garnet reaches Geyser. There, they meet Tiger, who seemed to have lost his will to climb to new heights. He`s making a living playing the villain on a "hero show" where Aget is pretending to be Golden Wings. Can Ace get back Tiger`s spunk? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 野獣学園SOS
Beast Academy SOS
Yajuu Gakuen SOS
episode.summary: The Dragon Caller Academy is an all-girls school where they teach students how to become a Dragon Caller. However, ever since the Dominion took over the world, the Academy has changed for the worse. Can Garnet, Academy`s alumni, make things right? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クロッカスの未来
Future of Crocus
Crocus no Mirai
episode.summary: Looking for his friends that`ll fight with him alongside against the Dominion, Ace and Garnet arrives in Linus. However, when Tamazo jumps at an opportunity to eat jelly dumplings, they`re spotted by the Dominion. How will they get out of this mess? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 姉妹
Sisters
Shimai
episode.summary: Ace, Tamazo, and Garnet goes to the Water City to find Herriot and Morgan. They`re relieved to see the two sisters seemingly doing well, enjoying a peaceful life hidden from the world. However, Garnet thinks there`s still some awkwardness between them. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 最後の原始化
The Last Reversion
Saigo no Genshika
episode.summary: Lance starts attacking Crocus to lure Golden Wings, causing Vahaton to come out of hiding. Knowing the kindness in Lance, Vahaton is determined to save Lance. Vahaton risks his life using Reversion, but is this what Lance really wants? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 追憶のランス
Memories of Lance
Tsuioku no Lance
episode.summary: Based on intel from Sonia, Ace and the gang head toward the Waterfall Cavern, where people from the Guild is gathered. At the same time, Ana left Stella with Angene to visit Crocus. She`s excited to see the outside world for the first time, but... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ソニアと命の木
Sonia and the Tree of Life
Sonia to Inochi no Ki
episode.summary: When Sonia arrives in Libria, she sees humans and Dragonoids hurting the forest. Anger consumes Sonia, causing the monsters to wreak havoc on the city. When Ace tries to calm Sonia down, it reminds her of the time she first met King... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 緑の守り神
The Green Guardian
Midori no Mamorigami
episode.summary: Ace, Garnet, Tamazo, and Tiger head to Libria and join up with Charo. A once lush but now lifeless Wood City has fallen into chaos as Dominion rule the city and their Tree of Life withering away... To top it all off, angry monsters are headed their way! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 凍てつく太陽
The Frozen Sun
Itetsuku Taiyou
episode.summary: Willingly accepting the Star Fragment`s power and his Reversion state, Lance continues his attack on everyone and everything. Crocus falls into chaos, and Ace is determined to stop Lance, to save Lance... It`s the final show-down between the two rivals! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ゼレモニの覚悟
Resolve of Zelemony
Zelemony no Kakugo
episode.summary: Going after Kroell, Ace and his friends find themselves in Zelemony. With Mere as their leader, the Guild Dragon Callers are fighting back to win back their city from the Dominion. However, Dominion has an evil plan to win back the people. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 正義の決断
Resolve of Justice
Seigi no Ketsudan
episode.summary: Eldora has finally woken up. Although worried about Geyser, she has yet to fully recover. On her behalf, Ace, Tiger, and Garnet goes to Geyser to check up on the city. There, they encounter a fort that Dominion has built, threatening everyone in Geyser. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: トーリエ奪還
Rescuing Torlie
Toorie Dakkan
episode.summary: After the battle between Ace and Lance, Drop Impacts have become a frequent occurrence around Crocus. Everyone is busy trying to dissipate them when Charo finds out where Torlie is being held. He decides to go rescue Torlie himself, but was that wise? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 魔神
King of Hell
Majin
episode.summary: With Satan`s help, Jest is back to wreak havoc, and completely breaks its seal and frees Satan by feeding him all those Drops. The SDF uses all the firepower they`ve got, but isn`t enough to stop Satan. Now it`s up to Ace to save the world. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 平和を壊す者
Destroyer of Peace
Heiwa o Kowasu Mono
episode.summary: With order back in Dragoza, humans are moving back to the island every day. The Guild is back in power and all seems right in the world. However, there seems to be something odd going on with the Drops that are scaring the monsters... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 星のない夜
A Starless Night
Hoshi no Nai Yoru
episode.summary: With Jest defeated and the Dominion no more, peace is restored. Meanwhile, Devi and Lance are spending quality time and getting their much-needed rest. However, not healing well, Devi collapses, and Lance struggles to find a way to save him. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光の塔をめざせ!
Head to the Tower of Light!
Hikari no Tou o Mezase!
episode.summary: To defeat Jest, Ace and the whole gang head to Exscion. Expecting their arrival, Jest had powerful monsters on stand-by. With his friends` help, Ace finally reaches the top, but struggles to fight off Kroell, powered up by his "bond" with Lucifer. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: キング
King
King
episode.summary: Ace and Lance manage to defeat Jest, but before they can celebrate, darkness starts to engulf the entire planet. Hofs explains that it is the will of this planet, the will of Terra Dragon. To save their planet and everyone they love, they head to Ymir. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 光の潰える時
When the Light Goes Out
Hikari no Tsuieru Toki
episode.summary: Jest continues to consume the Drops from the whole planet and there`s hardly any left for Ace and Lance to fight back. But that doesn`t mean they`ll give up! Lance realizes that Ace`s special ability is how they`ll open their way to victory. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: エースとランス
Ace and Lance
Ace to Lance
episode.summary: Ace and Lance finally join forces to take down Jest. However, that doesn`t stop Jest from absorbing alarming amounts of the Drops. The decrease in Drops is slowly killing all monsters... Ace and Lance will need to put a stop to this madness, quickly! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 究極存在
Ultimate Existence
Kyuukyoku Sonzai
episode.summary: Sealing the agreement with the King of Hell, Satan, Jest has regained his power, and then some. Jest`s wrath and his belief that every living being in the planet is worthless clashes with Ace, but his force is too great for Ace to stop alone... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: テラドラゴン
Terra Dragon
Terra Dragon
episode.summary: Ace and Lance reach Ymir and find King there. The five of them try to convince Terra Dragon to change its mind, but it is determined to destroy the current planet in order to recreate another without anguish. Will they be able to protect their planet? Source: crunchyroll
